name: ELCONQUISTADOR
0:
”Alexa, open el conquistador”
”Alexa, ask el conquistador for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start el conquistador”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: el conquistador
des: "Listen to your favorite radio station, el conquistador. You can pause and resume by saying 'Alexa, pause' and 'Alexa, resume.' Just say 'Alexa, stop' when you're done. This skill is created for the purpose of accessing the magical programming of the oldest radio station in South America, located in the city of Santiago de Chile. We hope you enjoy it and that it accompanies you always."
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
